H0.text: Which German mathematician, physicist and astonomer (1777 - 1855) was involved in the first worldwide survey of the Earth's magnetic field and gives his name to a unit of magnetic induction . Carl Friedrich Bessel

H1.text: Which German mathematician, physicist and astonomer (1777 - 1855) was involved in the first worldwide survey of the Earth's magnetic field and gives his name to a unit of magnetic induction . Heinrich Wilhelm Dove

H2.text: Which German mathematician, physicist and astonomer (1777 - 1855) was involved in the first worldwide survey of the Earth's magnetic field and gives his name to a unit of magnetic induction . Franz Neumann

H3.text: Which German mathematician, physicist and astonomer (1777 - 1855) was involved in the first worldwide survey of the Earth's magnetic field and gives his name to a unit of magnetic induction . GAUSS

A4.text: Gauss was involved in founding the Magnetic Association (Magnetischer Verein), an international working group that carried out measurements of Earth's magnetic field in many regions of the world from 1836 to 1841.

A5.text: Gauss devised spherical harmonic analysis to describe potential fields and used it to show most of Earth's magnetic field was from internal sources.
